places.name: Botanical Gardens
places.description: Founded in 1969, the Johannesburg Botanical Gardens can be located on 81-hectares of large, grassy, open spaces overlooking the 7,5-hectare Emmarentia Dam

places.name: Emmarentia Dam
places.description: The length of the dam is about 400 metres (1,310 ft) with a maximum depth of 6.7 metres (22 ft) and a water surface of 8.8 hectares (22 acres)

places.name: Greenside Animal Hospital
places.description: Greenside Animal Hospital is the prominent veterinary practice on the corner of Barry Hertzog Avenue and Muirfield Road in Greenside, Johannesburg

places.name: Checkers
places.address: Cnr Barry Hertzog Ave and, Luzi Ln, Emmarentia, 2195
places.description: At Checkers Emmarentia we offer a Primo Gelato counter, deli,meat market,Kosher wine and cheese world with fresh produce for your convenience!

places.name: Ocean Basket
places.address: Shop 143, Barry Hertzog Ave, Emmarentia, Randburg, 2195
places.description: Ocean Basket seafood restaurants give you the best of the Mediterranean lifestyle, with generous portions of quality seafood for you and your family

places.name: Pizza Hut
places.description: Almost 1 Metre of Pizza fun with the iconic Big Boss Pizza. Choose any 3 pizza flavours to make up your Big Boss Pizza!

places.name: Kitchen of OZ
places.description: At The Kitchen of OZ you will discover unexpected twists to your favourite classic foods. Every dish blends traditional family recipes with an urban adventure.

places.name: Emmarentia Library
places.description: Our aim as a library is to see constant improvement and continuous change in our community and a general adoption of a learning and prosporous local community
